entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
